name: Trapdoor Memory
description:
Entry for the Recycle Jam. As such some assets are recycled assets! Everything is in the public domain (CC0).

Select two trapdoors with the left mouse button to flip them. If they match, you get two points! You can look around with the right mouse button, and zoom with the mouse scroll wheel.

Source (which includes both sent and received assets) can be found at https://github.com/Nicate/TrapdoorMemory.

I had hoped to embed the game here, but unfortunately the WebGL build didn't look and sound correctly for some reason.
